login_with_email.title: Login with Email it
login_with_email.toast_ok_text: A magic link has been sent to you
login_with_email.toast_err_text: Something went wrong sending the link to your email

descriptions.title: This is your event public display name.
descriptions.description: Give your users details about this event, e.g. who it is for, what benefits it provides, what the teaching plan is, etc.
descriptions.location: Where will the event be held? If it is a venue, please provide directions to get there
descriptions.maxSubscribers: If it is a limited number, indicate the maximum number, otherwise write 0
descriptions.publicationStartDate: When the event will be visible online and users will be able to register

validation.title: Title must be at least 5 characters.
validation.publicationStartDate: The publication date must be before the event start date
validation.startDate: The start date must be before the event end date
